text: The first time you make a successful run on Archives each turn, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.
title: Alice Merchant: Clan Agitator

text: When you install Jarogniew Mercs, take 1 tag. Place 3 power counters on Jarogniew Mercs, and 1 additional power counter for each tag you have. When there are no power counters left on Jarogniew Mercs, trash it. The Corp cannot trash Jarogniew Mercs while there is another resource installed. Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.
title: Jarogniew Mercs

text: +2[mu] X[recurring-credit] Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of pieces of ice protecting HQ. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Māui

flavor: Everything you need in case of an emergency.
text:
Place X power counters on Bug Out Bag when you install it. If you have no cards in your grip at the end of your turn, draw 1 card for each power counter on Bug Out Bag, then trash it.
<errata>Errata from CR 1.2</errata>
title: Bug Out Bag

flavor: "I don't bother asking why anymore—he never says—but if I had to guess, it's because he's embezzling and using my runs to disguise it. Not that I care. His credit spends as well as the next guy's" -Moth
text: The first time you derez a piece of ice each turn, gain 2[credit].
title: Keros Mcintyre

flavor: "Taking risks is what makes it fun!" -Kabonesa Wu
text: +2[mu] The first time you initiate a run on a server protected by 2 or more pieces of ice each turn, draw 2 cards. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Daredevil

text: Whenever you use Mass-Driver to break all subroutines on a piece of ice during a single encounter, the first 3 subroutines on the next piece of ice you encounter this run do not resolve. 2[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
title: Mass-Driver

text: Whenever the Runner trashes 1 or more cards in or protecting this server (including Warroid Tracker), <trace>trace 4</trace> If successful, the Runner must trash 2 of his or her installed cards.
title: Warroid Tracker

text:
When the Runner encounters Loki, choose another rezzed piece of ice. Until the end of the run, Loki gains the subtypes of that ice and the subroutines of that ice before all Loki's other subroutines.
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner shuffles his or her grip into the stack.
title: Loki

flavor: "Proper application of stress can create the most profound changes." - Tennin Institute Intern Brief
text: As an additional cost to steal Obokata Protocol, the Runner must suffer 4 net damage.
title: Obokata Protocol

text:
If the Runner breaks the printed subroutine on Mirāju, he or she is now running on Archives instead of passing Mirāju and approaches the outermost ice, if any. Derez Mirāju.
[subroutine] The Corp may draw 1 card. Then, shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
title: Mirāju

text:
Play only if the Runner did not make a successful run during his or her last turn.
Place 2 advancement tokens on 1 card.
title: Shipment from Tennin

text: [click]: Gain 1[credit] for each tag the Runner has. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Escalate Vitriol

text: When you score Reeducation, add any number of cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D and draw that many cards. The Runner randomly adds the same number of cards from his or her grip to the bottom of the stack, if able.
title: Reeducation

flavor: "It's all about M.E. Monetizing Everything." -Eryn Nielle
text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice protecting this server, <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, the Corp gains 1[credit].
title: Traffic Analyzer

flavor: "I've got a rock!" - Charles "Mad Dog" Brun, Comet Jockey
text: When you score Meteor Mining, you may gain 7[credit]. If the Runner has at least 2 tags, you may do 7 meat damage instead.
title: Meteor Mining

text:
When you score Standoff, each player, starting with the Runner, trashes 1 of his or her installed cards until 1 player declines to trash a card. If the Runner declines, draw 1 card and gain 5[credit].
<errata>Errata from FAQ 4.1</errata>
title: Standoff

flavor: The difference between surviving and thriving is successful terraforming.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, forfeit an agenda and spend [click][click].
Advance a card X times. X equals the advancement requirement of the agenda just forfeited.
title: Success

flavor: "Whampoa is the largest and meanest Earth-based mining concern on Mars. They put bodies and waste in the ground as fast as they pull minerals out." - Alice Merchant
text: Trash 1 card from HQ: Add 1 card from Archives to the bottom of R&D. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Whampoa Reclamation

text: Gain 2[credit] for each card with at least 1 advancement token on it.
title: Mass Commercialization
